entities.name: Systran's cloud offer
entities.description: An offer developed by Systran specifically for clients with lower budgets, characterized by a very fast sales process (few weeks).

entities.name: Enterprise offers
entities.description: Systran's offerings for clients with security requirements and high budgets, typically involving a longer pre-sale process.

entities.name: Aftersales support
entities.description: A service provided by a dedicated team of aftersales engineers to help clients integrate Systran's solutions.

entities.name: Solution integration service
entities.description: Assistance provided to clients for integrating Systran's solutions, particularly crucial for large contracts with high integration requirements.

entities.name: End-user and administrator trainings
entities.description: Training sessions offered to end-users and administrators for effective use of Systran's solutions.

entities.name: Advisory for solution use
entities.description: Advisory services provided to clients for optimal utilization of Systran's solutions.

entities.segmentName: Clients with security requirements and high budgets
entities.characteristics: A client segment targeted by Systran's Enterprise offers, typically involving a longer and more complex sales process.
A client segment targeted by Systran's cloud offer, characterized by a fast sales process.
A market segment representing 70-80% of Systran's contracts, often involving lengthy pre-sale processes (up to 2 years) and RFPs.
A market segment representing 20-30% of Systran's contracts.

entities.description: Percentage of leads generated through direct marketing channels such as website, events, webinars, newsletters, and outbound prospection.
Percentage of leads generated through direct prospection by account managers leveraging their personal network.
Percentage of leads generated through indirect channels, primarily partners like integrators and resellers.
The proportion of Systran's total contracts that are public.
The proportion of Systran's total contracts that are private.

entities.kpiValueString: 1-2 months to >2 years (public contracts), average 6-9 months
entities.description: The typical duration of the pre-sale process for Systran's enterprise offerings, often involving RFPs, translation benchmarks, model customization, and security checks.
The typical duration of the sales process for Systran's cloud offer, noted for its speed.
